name: Oliver Krancher
content: Oliver Krancher - IT-University of Copenhagen Oliver Krancher Associate Professor Professor, Digital Business Innovation https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3876-3604 Emailolikitudk 20122025 Research activity per year Personal profile CurriculumOliver Krancher is a Full Professor in the Digital Business Innovation Section at the IT University of Copenhagen. His research focuses on digital sourcing, automation, and information systems development. He has published in leading journals in information systems and software engineering, including Journal of Management Information Systems, Journal of the Association for Information Systems, Journal of Strategic Information Systems, Journal of Information Technology, European Journal of Information Systems, MIS Quarterly Executive, Empirical Software Engineering, and Information & Software Technology. He currently serves as an Associate Editor at the Journal of the Association for Information Systems, a Department Editor at Business & Information Systems Engineering, and a Track Chair at international conferences such as the European Conference on Information Systems. His work has been recognized with several awards, including the AIS SIG Sourcing Early and Mid Career Award, the McKinsey Business Technology Award, the ITU Excellence in Teaching Award, the AIS Innovation in Teaching Award, and the TU Dresden Distinguished Scholar Award. Before joining the IT University of Copenhagen, he worked as a consultant at Accenture in Germany and earned his Ph.D. from the University of Bern in Switzerland, where he also held a position as Assistant Professor. He has been a visiting scholar at the Georgia Institute of Technology (USA), the University of Auckland (New Zealand), and the Technical University of Dresden (Germany).
